short_summary: Supply and delivery of Fruits and Vegetables
description: Request for offer to provide geographically zone based Regional Master Standing Offers (RMSO) for the supply and delivery of Fruits and Vegetables on an as and when requested basis.
duration_in_months: There is no end date, therefore I
full_summary:
### Fruits and Vegetables RMSO

| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| Reference | WS4161872761-Doc4161959135 |
| Amendment Number | 2 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4161872761 |
| **Competition Details**
| Posting Date | 2023-09-07 |
| Tender Closing Date | October 17, 2023 at 14:00 EDT |
| Amendment Date | October 13, 2023 |
| | 

### Tender Overview
#### Background

This tender invitation is an amendment to the original competition. The contracting authority seeks to establish a geographically zone-based Regional Master Standing Offers (RMSO) contract to supply and deliver fresh fruits and vegetables on an as-and-when-requested basis for various user departments in the province of Ontario.

#### Scope of Work

The Ontario Region has been divided into six zones:

* Southern Ontario (1)
* Central Ontario (2)
* North Western Ontario (3)
* North Eastern Ontario (4)
* National Capital Region (5)
* Eastern Ontario (6)

Each zone may result in the issuance of up to three (3) Standing Offers. Bidders may submit pricing on as many or as few line items as they wish for each zone.

#### Key Dates

* Posting Date: September 7, 2023
* Amendment Date: October 13, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 17, 2023 14:00 EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 1, 2023

#### Selection Criteria
The government will select the most responsive bidders based on the lowest price.

#### Language
The tender language is English and French. Offering organizations may provide their documents in the language of their choice.

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*
